text.title: FishBowl Suite
text.subtitle: Suite with stunning pool and garden views

features.name: King-Size Comfort
features.description: Spacious KING bed (180cm x 200cm) with stunning pool and garden views.

features.name: Luxurious Bath Retreat
features.description: Exclusive suite with a glowing onyx vanity and a separate shower.

features.name: Dedicated Workspace
features.description: Long desk with a comfortable chair, ideal for productivity.

features.name: Seamless Storage
features.description: Built-in wardrobe for a sleek and organized living space.

features.name: Climate Comfort
features.description: Air conditioning and dehumidifier to ensure the perfect atmosphere.

features.name: Premium Tech Essentials
features.description: Portable waterproof Sonos speaker, charging station, and security box.

features.name: Serene Outdoor Bath
features.description: Relaxing bathtub under the trees for a tranquil experience.

features.name: Elegant Light Drapery
features.description: Mosquito netting curtains for comfort and airflow (not blackout).
